WumbleMinkysCombatChatCard.mergeCard.hin: Merge Attack/Spell/Item rolls into a single card (requires libWrapper)
WumbleMinkysCombatChatCard.onlyAttackAdd: When an attack is available, only the attack will add roll results. Otherwise, any roll will add a result.
You cannot roll damage without first rolling attack while 'Only Attacks Add Result' is enabled.
